Description: Small sandstone tool in the shape of a cone with a very flat and polished base with a steep side of the cone. Well-smoothed lateral surface with an area that shows traces of wedging. The base of the cone shows a cross drawn thick lines of black ink. In the centre of the cross a circle was added with a diameter of 1.7 cm.
Bibliographic references: Spencer 1997 / Amara West I, The Architectural Report (p. 158)
